The post Article Writing Contest appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Article Writing Contest

An online article writing event was organized by the Association of Civil Engineering Students from 12th September to 16th September 2021. The event was led and executed successfully under the able guidance of Prof.Yuvraj Singh .

The event was a part of one of the various technical and social events organized by ACES. These events are organized from time to time with the objective to provide a platform for the students to showcase their talent with a competitive spirit.

The event was successful enough to attract as many as 40+ registrations. The themes for the event included sustainable engineering, automation in engineering, road safety, and traffic management, and recent advances in engineering.

The winners were encouraged with a certificate, trophies and were given the chance to become a part of the college’s newsletter editor board. The participants wereÂ also given certificates as a token of encouragement.

The post Chatur Naar appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Chatur Naar

In this situation of pandemic Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized a virtual Quiz competition named âEK CHATURâ. It was a three-round event, conducted on 26th August,2021. The event was conducted using Google form (timed quiz) where all participated in a mind refreshing quiz competition with greatÂ  enthusiasm. Total registrations were 88.

The first round ‘Chalak Chatur’ held from 4:00 PM to 4:16 PM. The second roundÂ  ‘Mysterious Chatur’ held from 4:20 PM to 4:41 PM. The third round ‘IntelligentÂ  Chatur’ was conducted from 4:45 PM to 5:05 PM. The results were declared at 8 PM on the ACES official Instagram (@gndec_aces) The winners were decided accordingÂ  to the maximum total marks in three rounds of quiz and the minimum time taken toÂ  attempt all three quizes.Â

The post Bridge Constructor appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Bridge Constructor

Event: Bridge Constructor

The event will consist of 2 Rounds: a)  First Round: Quiz-Picto-Mania

  1. b) Second Round : Pont- BÃ¢timent

Rules For Quiz-Picto-Mania:

  1. This round will contain a quiz based on current affairs, general knowledge with logo, and Historical Architectural identification (pictorial form).
  2. The quiz will contain 15 questions :
    1. 5 Questions: Current Affairs and General Knowledge (1 mark each).
    2. 5 Questions:  Historical Architectural IdentificationPIctorial (2 marks each).
    3. 5 Questions: Pictorial test of the logo (2 marks each).
  3.  The quiz will be in the form of multiple-choice questions and will be time bounded i.e Each Question will have a time limit.
  4. A platform for quizzes will be  Kahoot.

Result: On the basis of the Results of the Quiz-Picto-Mania Round we will select the top 15 participants for our Mega Round i.e  Pont BÃ¢timent.

Note: In case of a tie between participants the least incorrect answer will be considered.

Rules For Pont-BÃ¢timent

  1. All the participants will be given three days to complete the project.
  2. We will provide a list of 25 things from which participants have to use a minimum of 10 things and a maximum of 25 things enlisted.
  3. Participants cannot use anything that is not enlisted in the materials given below, if anything is used outside the enlisted material, the bridge model will not be considered.

Note: Participants can use anything other than 25 things listed present at their home due to Lockdown but a maximum of 25 only.

  1. During the model-making process, participants have to click 10 photos of the model showing the progress of the project.
  2. A list of materials that participants have used is to be submitted in a PDF file.
  3. Participants will be provided with Google Form for Submission where they have to upload those photos in the form of PDF.
Winners

The post Design Mania appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Design Mania

Detailed Rules and Regulations:
1. Register for the event Here
2. You will be added to the WhatsApp group of the event.
3. The name of the game is (MultiCraft) you can download it from Play Store or by using this link:
For Android:- Download
For iOS:- Download
4. Design the Civil Engineering Structure in single-player creative mode. (Try to build your structure offline as the game may contain some ads)
5. Afterdesigningconverttheworldofyours into zip format. Place the zip file in your google drive and provide the link to us.
6. Demo video for this will be available on WhatsApp group.
7. You need to upload a total of 4 files by using this link
â¢Screenshot of your structure when it is
25% complete
50%complete
75% complete
â¢Zip file of your world in-game.
